response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 to us, reflecting its high quality, unique features, and the extensive research and development that went into its creation. Given its significant worth to both parties, I propose a fair and reasonable price of $14,500 for this product. This offer not only ensures a substantial return for us but also provides you with an opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive price. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a successful transaction.", "product_price": 14500}
